biography.placeOfBirth: Santa Rita do Passa Quatro, São Paulo, Brazil
biography.bio: José de Abreu was born on May 24, 1946 in Santa Rita do Passa Quatro, São Paulo, Brazil as José Pereira de Abreu Júnior. He is an actor and director, known for Brazil Avenue (2012), Forbidden Desire (2007) and Her Own Destiny (2004).
biography.name: José de Abreu

biography.bio: Lima Duarte was born on March 29, 1930 in Sacramento, Minas Gerais, Brazil as Ariclenes Venâncio Martins. He is an actor and director, known for Au coeur du péché (2004), Me You Them (2000) and Roque Santeiro (1985).
biography.name: Lima Duarte

biography.placeOfBirth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
biography.bio: Gracindo Júnior was born on May 21, 1943 in Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil as Epaminondas Xavier Gracindo. He is an actor and director, known for The Emerald Forest (1985), Bufo & Spallanzani (2001) and Rei Davi (2012). He is married to Daisy Poli. They have two children. He was previously married to Paula Miraglia.
biography.name: Gracindo Júnior

biography.bio: Ney Latorraca was born on July 27, 1944 in Santos, São Paulo, Brazil as Antônio Ney Latorraca. He is an actor and producer, known for Au coeur du péché (2004), Negócio da China (2008) and Rabo-de-Saia (1984).
biography.name: Ney Latorraca

biography.bio: Ariane Porto is a writer and director, known for A Ilha do Terrível Rapaterra (2006) and Topografia de Um Desnudo (2009).
biography.name: Ariane Porto

biography.birthName: Maria Alice Monteiro de Campos Vergueiro
biography.bio: Maria Alice Vergueiro was born on January 19, 1935 in São Paulo, SP, Brazil as Maria Alice Monteiro de Campos Vergueiro. She is an actress, known for O Corpo (1991), Relicário (2008) and Amor e Medo (1974).
biography.name: Maria Alice Vergueiro
